inclusion.criterion: Active TED: Onset less than 6 months AND: Progressive with historic or measured worsening in one or more of VISA parameters in past 2 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Moderately severe TED (all of the following criteria must be met): V: No optic neuropathy I: Inflammatory score >/= 4/10 S: Intermittent or constant diplopia in any direction except primary gaze AND/OR restriction in ductions to < 30 degrees in any cardinal direction on clinical examination
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: No optic neuropathy, inflammatory score >/= 4/10, intermittent or constant diplopia, and/or restriction in ductions

exclusion.criterion: Previous orbital surgery or radiotherapy for TED
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Corticosteroid or immunotherapy within previous 2 months for TED
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable or unwilling to provide informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and is experiencing worsening dysphagia, poor oral intake, weight loss, and lethargy. They have undergone XRT and RAI ablation.
